bibl.title: The Rivals of Aristophanes. Studies in Athenian Old Comedy
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXII, 4301. - I. Introduction (David HARVEY). - II. The text: (a) POxy. 4301; - (b) Kassel-Austin PCG VIII, Adespota, 1151; - (c) A conjectural reconstruction (W.L.). - III. Some thoughts on POxy. 4301 (I.C.S.). - Notes. Bibliography.
